text:
Hi, does anyone know if it’s possible to make webpages meta tag fields required? I’ve had a couple of issues where some clients have created a page and may have forgotten to add one I’m keen to build a script and it be populated automatically if not populated but wanted to flag it to users when creating a page that they need to be there when published.

Seems to be the case on landing pages but not web?
is there a field/property that identifies Double Opt In is acknowledges?
<@U22PKFRU5> I followed your proposal and logged a ticket to HubSpot support. It was a bug and the product team looked into it. It is now fixed. Thank you again for your help :slightly_smiling_face:
